title: Ep 118 - Talking With The Dead
description:
The first half of this episode is a real “shootin the shit and lettin it rip” session. The boys talk about their weekend: Todd’s battle with his mice infestation, Digs’ trip to The Bourbon Trail, Nick and Zito’s run-in with the Vice President of The United States and more.

The second half of this episode features an interview with paranormal investigator Dave Schrader and psychic medium Cindy Kaza. They talk about their new show on Travel Channel, “The Holzer Files” and explain the ins and outs of hauntings and communicating with the dead.
dc:creator: The Pod
